faq.question: Do guests need an app?
faq.answer: No. They scan the QR with their camera and answer in their browser in about 30 seconds.

faq.question: How long does setup take?
faq.answer: Most teams are live in 5 minutes. Sign up, pick questions, print your poster, and you're ready.

faq.question: Can I customize questions?
faq.answer: Yes. Use our templates or your own questions anytime.

faq.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq.answer: Yes. No long-term contracts. Upgrade, downgrade, or cancel whenever you want.

faq.question: Is customer data secure?
faq.answer: Yes. Data is encrypted in transit and at rest. Feedback is anonymous by default, and we don't sell data.
